hero.description: With us, you will discover amazing corners of the planet that you could only dream of before. Enjoy the beauty of the world, immersing yourself in the culture, nature and history that make each place unique. Let each of your trips be unforgettable and full of vivid impressions.

info.card1: Choose the best price for the tour on our website
info.card2: Send a request and we will select a tour for you
info.card3: Pay for the tour in any convenient way

tours.description: At Fayd, we have put together a collection of tours that reflect the diversity and richness of our planet. From ancient cities to untouched nature reserves, we have a tour for everyone. Explore the world with us and choose your perfect itinerary:
tours.malaysia-description: Here you can find ancient temples, colonial cities, tropical forests and beautiful beaches.
tours.qatar-description: Qatar is a wealthy country known for its skyscrapers, luxury shops and expensive cars.
tours.thailand-description: Thailand is famous for its islands, picturesque beaches, culture and rich cuisine.
tours.egypt-description: A country in northeastern Africa, known for its ancient history and cultural heritage.
tours.turkey-description: Famous for its Mediterranean coastline and rich history, you can enjoy the magnificent culture and delicious Turkish cuisine.
tours.dubai-description: The largest city in the UAE, famous for its tall skyscrapers, luxurious shopping malls and amazing theme parks.

leave-number.description: We are always happy to help you plan your perfect trip. If you have any questions, suggestions or requests, please fill out the form below. We will contact you shortly!

about.title: About Us
about.description:
Fayd is your trusted travel partner. We specialize in creating unique and unforgettable tours that will allow you to discover new horizons and have unforgettable experiences.
With Fayd, you can immerse yourself in the culture and traditions of other countries, visit picturesque places and enjoy the vacation you deserve. We care about each client and guarantee that your trip will be flawless.
Our mission is to make every trip comfortable and safe for you, and to provide a high level of service at every stage of your adventure. The Fayd team consists of professionals who love their work and are always ready to offer customized solutions that meet your wishes and needs.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: We pay special attention to the choice of places and routes so that our clients can not only relax, but also get unforgettable impressions and photos as a keepsake.

reasons.title: 4 reasons to choose our travel agency
reasons.description: We guarantee high quality service and the best service for our clients to make their trip as comfortable as possible.
reasons.card-description-1: Fayd offers a variety of routes and destinations, allowing you to explore the world in all its diversity.
reasons.card-description-2: We value your trust and guarantee that every journey with us will be flawless and unforgettable.
reasons.card-description-3: Our team of professionals ensures complete comfort and safety at every stage of your journey.
reasons.card-description-4: We take into account all your wishes and offer unique tours created especially for you.
